name: places/ChIJd2quxSj3wokRDrhTSgqihMY
formattedAddress: 301 E 108th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 301 E 108th St, New York, NY 10029-3704, USA

originalText.text: This past weekend I had the honor of attending the Grand Opening at Lavilu. I was greeted by the owner and made to feel as we were family. The staff was professional, friendly and gave us our space as we were looking through the items being sold. The store is decorated beautifully with areas to sit and chat with the staff as we asked about the items and how Lavilu came to be. In addition the items being sold were of high quality and hip. I loved that covid guidelines were being followed and that it was clean and airy. I highly recommend shopping here. I look forward to stopping back again and making Lavilu part of my Wardrobe.

originalText.text: The Grand Opening was wonderful. So much love and joy was felt.  It’s an exceptional fashionable line geared towards the modern male. The LaVilu men’s boutique decor is very stylish and trendy. Kudos to the owners for bringing a unique fresh style to the East Harlem community.

text.text: The Grand Opening was wonderful. So much love and joy was felt.  It’s an exceptional fashionable line geared towards the modern male. The LaVilu men’s boutique decor is very stylish and trendy. Kudos to the owners for bringing a unique fresh style to the East Harlem community.

originalText.text: Wonderful experience visiting Lavilu. I especially enjoyed being greeted by the owner and was made to feel at home. The store has a relaxed feel to it, with a comfortable sofa to sit on as we chatted with the owner and staff. I especially loved the quality of my hat and shirt which I’m currently sporting. Best wishes to the owner. Worth the trip!!! Can’t wait to visit again and make more purchases.

originalText.text: Lavilu is an awesome, welcoming and inviting store. There is a positive vibe as soon as you enter the store. The big smiles, friendly greetings, attention to detail and extraordinary customer service makes this store stand out. The quality of the clothing is excellent. A great brand for teens and adults! I highly recommend this business.

text.text: Lavilu is an awesome, welcoming and inviting store. There is a positive vibe as soon as you enter the store. The big smiles, friendly greetings, attention to detail and extraordinary customer service makes this store stand out. The quality of the clothing is excellent. A great brand for teens and adults! I highly recommend this business.

originalText.text: The store is amazing! The ambiance is perfect. It’s a men’s store but can be worn by females. The Grand Opening was great, not a long line, was in and out within 10mins. Purchase was easy and the owners introduced themselves personally to each customer. I will definitely be a returned customer!!
